activities: We collect information according to the product or service involved, including business contact information, financial information and information related to support. Information may be used for a variety of purposes, including customer service, billing, software download and software and service support. In connection with our provision of services, some customers may request us to maintain, host, or provide us with access to, data. In connection with such services, the customer has control of such data and any access to or use of such data by us is incidental to completing our contractual requirements for the customer. We also may transfer information from affilaited companies in EU to our offices in the United States for internal management of personnel including administration of payroll, services and benefits.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for all data types.
